attributes.title: They should be ashamed for making this
attributes.review: Dude it took a whole month to download and when it did it started to make my WiFi SLOWWWW so if u don’t want it to take away the money you worked hard for to pay for you WiFi and phone (it also made my phone die and crash) then at all cost do not download this TERRIBLE APP.

attributes.title: This gave me cancer
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app just to get it off the App Store but little did I know when I opened the app my nuts were immediately licked on by a cow, and crazy thing there’s no cows in my area, turns out that cow had malaria so I hunted down the cow and shot him with my bow and arrow turns out the malaria in the saliva got into my cheeks and caused stage 7 cancer, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: Great
attributes.review: I love this go Trump. this is disgusting that people are putting fake 1 star reviews that are complete lies. It took less than a minute to download.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!!
attributes.review: I would like to stop anyone from getting this app before they do!! I cannot believe something like this is still up and it needs to be banned, the content is disgusting and makes me feel unsafe! Don’t make the same mistake I did and make sure to NOT download this app! This is by far the WORST app I have ever come across.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app has horrible development and supports racist, homophobic, rapists who think they can do anything they want in the world. this app NEDS TO GET DELETED. i’ve gotten scary text messages from the app saying that people can see me and that they are tracking my phone. this should NOT exist at all. this is a life threatening app that should not be on the app store!!!!!!

attributes.title: too many glitches 😴
attributes.review: This app had way too many glitches. It took forever to download. I love my President Dump but this app is a no no. I put in my phone number and I dont know how to stop the messages from coming in! The messages kept saying that i won free tickets and a yard sign. This app seems like a scam to me. Please dont download this app! ITS A SCAM!!!!!!

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: Took almost 40 hours to go through. Once opening the app it takes several minutes to load. Horrible UI. Least intuitive I’ve ever seen. Almost impossible to find any worthwhile information. You’re better off just following Trump’s Facebook. Take care y’all!

attributes.title: Gave me the sh*ts
attributes.review: The minute I downloaded this app I started have the worst diarrhea I’ve ever had in my life. I know what you’re thinking it must’ve been a coincidence but as soon as I deleted it off my phone I felt instantly better. Unless you’re trying to get skinnnnyyyyyyy don’t download this app, you’ll have the runs non stop 😩😩. Free laxative tho

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: First thing I see is “keep America great”, no we can’t keep America great if this mother freaking orange and his tangerines are trying to run for president. Then there’s racism, like wow great way to get people of other races to vote for you😉 like just perfect🙄. I’m not even going to waste my time to go through the rest of the app. JUST TRASH😐. Anyone who votes more than 1 star are clowns🤡

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app crashes every time you try to open it and makes my phone restart. Not to mention that it represents a hate group in America full of white supremacy that I worry is negatively impacting its users and their already lowered IQs. This app deserves to be destroyed immediately with the same level of vigor and hate that Donald Trump demonstrates about women and minorities.
